node.title: Black and White Theme
node.excerpt: Adds a black and white theme to select inside the settings window

node.title: Biome Themes
node.excerpt: Adds multiple biome themes to select inside the settings window

node.title: Coffee Theme
node.excerpt: Adds a coffee theme to select inside the settings window, additionally replacing some navigation icons. Caffeine not included.

node.title: Basic Animated Background-Theme
node.excerpt: This theme uses properties never used before to create a really awesome looking animated background to level up your bridge. experience. For Dark Theme users ONLY.

node.title: Stone Theme
node.excerpt: An alternative light mode, with actual light mode now!

node.title: Simply Json
node.excerpt: More tools for your addons. From components to auto completions, this will make making addons easier.

node.title: Deep Blue Theme
node.excerpt: Adds a deep blue color theme to select inside the settings window

node.title: Useful Presets
node.excerpt: A set of useful presets people use often enough to be a preset

node.title: Violet Magic Theme
node.excerpt: Adds a nice looking theme to bridge (looks better in dark theme)

node.title: Volcanic and Aquatic Themes
node.excerpt: Adds two new volcanic and aquatic color themes to select inside the settings window
